CSS: #footer{background:linear-gradient(to right, #001f3f, #FF851B);padding:20px 0;color:#fff;text-align:center;font-family:'Futura', sans-serif;border-top:3px solid #FF4136;}.footer-links a{color:#fff;text-decoration:none;margin:0 15px;font-size:0.9em;}.footer-links a:hover{text-decoration:underline;}.newsletter{margin-top:10px;}.newsletter p{font-size:1.1em;margin-bottom:10px;}.newsletter form{display:inline-block;}.newsletter input[type='email']{padding:10px;border:none;border-radius:5px 0 0 5px;outline:none;min-width:200px;}.newsletter button{padding:10px 20px;background:#FF4136;border:none;border-radius:0 5px 5px 0;color:#fff;font-weight:bold;cursor:pointer;transition:background 0.3s ease-in-out;}.newsletter button:hover{background:#85144b;}
